thread.title: Over 19 IoT Radio Protocols Drive the Need for Integration APIs
thread.title_full: Over 19 IoT Radio Protocols Drive the Need for Integration APIs

author: Fratto, Mike
title: Over 19 IoT Radio Protocols Drive the Need for Integration APIs
text: September 23, 2015 Rate this report Analyst Blog Think there are too many networking standards? Take a peek at the 19 (and counting) radio protocols used in the home, office, and industrial IoT. Stitching the products together will happen at the application layer via APIs.
